title: Input not supported
body:
For the first time, after playing some games today, an error pops up after the champions selection, saying "Input not supported".
now Iv'e read about the file game.cfg and the thing with the resolution, thats not it. my screen resolution is 1600x900, and it's the resolution defined in the game as well. I even tried changing it to window mode through this file, and i managed to get in the game, but then, as i change it back to full screen (after reassuring the resolution is 1600x900) the error pops up again and i can't see a thing. another problem is, that when the error pops up, i still hear everything, but i can't minimize the client, nor exit with ALT+F4, tried everything, all i can do i force a restart by pressing the restart button on my computer. 
I need your help, thanks.

replies.body:
What happens if you try loading windowed mode but with a lower resolution?  If you're not able to change your resolution due to not seeing the game, try through resetting your config to default:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

That could serve as a workaround in the meantime.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually to figure this out.  We'll get back to you!
